title: Twisted Treeline: Riot VS Community - Friday 19th (3PM PST) ~ How to join and Info
body:
**Rioters**

* Riot KateyKhaos
* ManWolfAxeBoss
* Riot Nekomaru

**How to Join**
Join **riotvscommunity3v3** chatroom by 3pm PST to play. I'll randomly draft from there.

**Shoutcasters**

* Explorer Ezreal
* Kuronii Lumiira

**Stream**
http://www.twitch.tv/lostbob117tv
